thread.title: Grammy Museum to Open Newark Location This Fall - WSJ
thread.title_full: Grammy Museum to Open Newark Location This Fall - WSJ

author: Kate King
title: Grammy Museum to Open Newark Location This Fall - WSJ
text:
NY Region Grammy Museum to Open Newark Location This Fall The commitment is the latest by developers and businesses to New Jersey’s largest city, which for years struggled to lure investors By @KCarliniKing Feb. 7, 2017 12:00 a.m. ET 
The Grammy Museum plans to pay homage to musical legends Bruce Springsteen, Frank Sinatra and Whitney Houston in their native state of New Jersey. 
This fall, the museum is slated to open its first East Coast location in Newark, N.J., and the Garden State’s musicians will get top billing in the 8,200-square-foot exhibit space. 
The announcement marks the latest commitment by developers and businesses to New Jersey’s largest... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
